text: ANNOUNCEMENTS: Employees Pension Benefits Fund Bill: Petition to the Supreme Court
CONTROL OF PESTICIDES (AMENDMENT) BILL: Read the First time
PRIVATE MEMBERS BILLS: Sri Lanka Association for Fisheries and Aquatic Resources (Incorporation) [The Hon. Victor Antony] Read the First time
ADJOURNMENT MOTION: Immediate Provision of School Uniform Material

" " : "NILA SEVANA" HOUSING PROJECT: NUMBER OF HOUSES
asked the Minister of Construction, Engineering Services, Housing and Common Amenities:
(i) whether steps were taken to build a housing project named Nila Sevana close to Ragama town for the purpose of providing houses for Public sector employees ;
(ii) if so, the date on which it was commenced ;
(iii) the number of houses that have been planned to be built under the proposed housing project ;
(iv) if the construction work of the aforesaid project has already been started the number of houses of which construction work has been completed by now ; and
(v) the proposed date by which the construction work of the aforesaid housing project will be completed?
( - , , , ) (The Hon. Wimal Weerawansa - Minister of Construction, Engineering Services, Housing and Common Amenities) , ? ( ) (The Hon. John Amaratunga) . . .
( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Felix Perera - Minister of Social Services) , - ( ) (The Deputy Speaker) . .
( - , ) (The Hon. Gitanjana Gunawardena - Deputy Minister of Finance and Planning) , .
() , ? asked the Minister of Finance and Planning:
(i) as to when and in what extent the prices of cigarettes and alcohol have been increased for the last 10 years on per year basis; and
(ii) the total revenue earned in each occasion, owing to the increase over the previous rate separately, for cigarettes and alcohol?
(b) Will he state whether the Government is interested to discourage the usage of cigarettes and alcohol through the increase of prices?
(c) Will he also state all the taxes imposed on cigarettes and alcohol, separately?

( ) (The Hon. Sajith Premadasa) , . ( ) (The Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena) , . . . Question ordered to stand down. : , : CHAIRMAN OF MAGA NEGUMA MACHINERY AND CONSTRUCTION COMPANY: DETAILS
2. ( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Ravi Karunanayake on behalf of the Hon. Dayasiri Jayasekara) - (2):
asked the Minister of Ports and Highways:
(i) the person in authority who appointed the current Chairman of the Maga Neguma Machinery and Construction Company;
(ii) the age of the above-mentioned Chairman;
(iii) his previous place of work and the position he held there; and
(iv) the professional experience he has acquired?
( - , ) (The Hon. Nirmala Kotalawala - Deputy Minister of Ports and Highways) , * .
4. ( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Ravi Karunanayake on behalf of the Hon. Gamini Jayawickrama Perera) - (2):
() , ? asked the Minister of Irrigation and Water Resources Management:

(a) Will he inform this House- (i) the progress of the Deduru Oya Reservoir Project at present; (ii) the names of the areas to which water is provided under this scheme; (iii) whether a hydro power plant will be constructed under this scheme; and (iv) if so, its electricity generating capacity?
(b) Will he state- (i) the number of small and medium-scale tanks in the Yapahuwa Electorate; and (ii) whether those tanks will be provided with water from the aforesaid scheme?
(c) If not, why ? ( ) (The Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena) , * .
() . . ( ) (The Deputy Speaker) 6 -1007/'10- (2), . ( ) (The Hon. Ravi Karunanayake) , . ( ) (The Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena) , . . . Question ordered to stand down.
( - ) (The Hon. Piyankara Jayaratne - Minister of Civil Aviation) , . . . Question ordered to stand down.
: : MORAGAHAKANDA RESERVOIR PROJECT : WATER SUPPLY AREAS 0969/10 11. ( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Ravi Karunanayake on behalf of the Hon.Gamini Jayawickrama Perera) - (2):
asked the Minister of Irrigation and Water Resources Management:
(a) Will he state the areas to which water is supplied under the Moragahakanda Reservoir Project?
(b ) Will he admit that it had been planned to supply water to Yapahuwa and Galgamuwa areas under this scheme by channelling water from the aforesaid reservoir along Mee Oya via Dambulla?
(c) Will he state whether some other way of supplying water to Yapahuwa and Galgamuwa areas will be submitted?
- : POLTAWANA-GORAKADENIYA ROAD: TARRING 0727/10 14. ( ) ( - ) (The Hon. Ravi Karunanayake on behalf of the Hon. Dayasiri Jayasekara) - (2):
asked the Minister of Ports and Highways:
(i) of the institution under which the Polthawana Gorakadeniya Road in Panduwasnuwara West Divisional Secretariat Division comes ; and
(ii) whether permission has been obtained from the relevant institution to tar that road?
(i) the name of the institution or names of the persons entrusted with the task of tarring the aforesaid road ;
(ii) the estimated amount of money allocated in that respect ;
(iii) the length and width of the road to be tarred, according to that estimate ;
(iv) the length of the stretch of road that has been tarred by now ; and
(v) the date on which tarring was completed?
(c) Is he aware that tarring of that road has not been done conforming to the standards many places have cared in by now and that the specified length has not been tarred?
(d) If so, will he inform this House of the measures that will be taken against the institution or persons that carried out constructions without conforming to the standards?
. 2011 04, . Presented by the Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena on behalf of the Minister of Agriculture; to be read a Second time upon Wednesday, 04th, May, 2011 and to be printed.
( ) , , () SRI LANKA ASSOCIATION FOR FISHERIES AND AQUATIC RESOURCES (INCORPORATON) BILL

, . , , . . 47 (5) , . Question put, and agreed to. Bill accordingly read the First time, and ordered to be printed. The Bill stood referred, under Standing Order No. 47(5), to the Minister of Fisheries and Aquatic Resources Development for report.
IMMEDIATE PROVISION OF SCHOOL UNIFORM MATERIAL ( ) (The Hon. Ajith Kumara) , :
, , ... . Whereupon MR. DEPUTY SPEAKER left the Chair, and THE HON. ALHAJ A.H.M. AZWER took the Chair.
( ) (The Presiding Member) , ? ( ) (The Hon. Buddhika Pathirana) . . . . . ? . ? "! " . , . . . . , . ( ) (The Presiding Member) ? ?
( ) (The Hon. Buddhika Pathirana) , . , . " " . . ( ) (The Presiding Member) Is there a reply from the Hon. Minister?
( ) (The Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena) , . , . . Question put, and agreed to.
Adjourned accordingly at 1.57 p.m. until 1.00 p.m. on Tuesday, 03rd May, 2011.

. NOTE Corrections which Members suggest for the Final Print should be clearly marked in their copy and sent to be Editor of HANSARD within two weeks of receipt of the uncorrected copy. Contents of Proceedings : Final set of manuscripts Received from Parliament : Printed copies dispatched :

A single copy of Hansard is available for Rs. 18.15. (Postage Rs. 2.50) Copies can be obtained by remitting in advance an annual subscription fee to the SUPERINTENDENT, GOVERNMENT PUBLICATIONS BUREAU, No. 102,Piyasiri Building, Pamankada Road, Kirulapone, Colombo 6. The fee should reach him on or before November 30 each year . Late applications for subscriptions will not be accepted. .
